channel.title: Changing a npc Direction
channel.description: Hi guys i was wonding this ayone know how you change the way a npc is looking because i am trying to make a npc look north and not south code i used in autospawn //------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 409 3223 3216 0 -2 0 2 2 1 genie

item.title: Changing a npc Direction
item.dc:creator: @shane11 shane11
item.description:
@shane11 wrote:

Change the number after 3216 to -1 -2 -3 and 1 2 3, just mess with the numbers a little bit. That’s the best way.

Read full topic
